Reference Product Description: The Oxford button-down is a stylish wardrobe staple with endless versatility, so it’s no surprise that our signature Oxford, The Jack, has become a mainstay of our roster. Its burly 100% organic cotton basket weave and double-needle felled construction make it sturdy enough to stand up to the roughest workday, while peerless tailoring and a clean, pleatless design means it’s snazzy enough for your next night on the town. Soft to the touch but built for a decade of solid wear. Oxford is a perfectly versatile fabric that looks just as good pressed as it does pulled off the back of a chair. While traditional cotton uses 25% of the world's pesticides, our organic cotton doesn't use a drop. A better shirt, Responsibly Built For The Long Haul. 6-oz. 100% organic cotton. Made from our burly rugby oxford. Our signature Jack button-down collar. Garment dyed and washed for a soft, lived-in feel. Double-needle felled construction throughout. Natural buttons. Lock-stitched buttons and buttonholes. Shorter length to be worn untucked. Tailored fit and high armhole. No pleats for easy ironing and clean lines. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Model is 6'0", wearing a Medium.

The Chore Pant in Aged Penny Chipped Canvas from Taylor Stitch 12.5-oz. 100% organic cotton canvas. 6-oz. 100% organic cotton SF Map pocketing. Stone washed for a worn in look and feel. Angled front slash pockets for easy entry. Two half-lined back patch pockets. Signature double-knee reinforced construction. Pen sleeve on both front panels. Front and back pockets bar-tacked at stress points. Button fly closure. Double-needle construction throughout. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China.

Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Getting the best of both worlds is what Taylor Stitch's signature Après Pant is all about. With the cozy comfort of your favorite sweats, the dashing good looks of a trusty set of chinos, and all the hard wearing functionality you’ve come to expect from our expert craftsmen, The Après Pant is built to bring you from the couch, to the trail, to that last minute lunch date all without missing a step. This dimensional Natural Sashiko iteration has been given a heavy garment wash for an ultra soft, broken-in feel right out of the box. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. Beautiful sashiko slub texture. Washed for a worn in feel. Lightly washed to bring out the amazing texture. Two front slash front pockets. Two back patch button-through pockets. Custom SF map print pocketing, made with 100% organic cotton. Elastic waistband with drawcord. Elastic cuff at hem. Dark horn buttons. Button fly. 30" inseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low.

With its classic French chore coat silhouette that’s easy to dress up or down and an abundance of utility-focused features, it’s no wonder why The Ojai has become one of our most popular designs ever. This iteration is rendered in an organic cotton twill that’s reverse-engineered from deadstock military fabric, so it’ll stand up to years of hard wear and pick up incredible character along the way.

The Signature Chaise Lounger is the perfect companion for ultimate relaxation on your pool’s sun shelf, tanning ledge, baja shelf, sun deck, or any flat surface submerged in 0-9” of water. Its ergonomic design and water-friendly materials provide unparalleled comfort and support, allowing you to bask in the sun while enjoying a refreshing dip at the same time. Its curves are designed to conform to your body’s natural contours for your complete comfort. At the same time, the chaise’s timeless simplicity and clean aesthetic add a touch of elegance to your poolside scene, while its durable construction lets it stand up against all the elements.

Our multi-operational Essential Umbrella features an aluminum center pole and is ideal for both in-pool and on-deck use. High-quality materials, such as fiberglass ribs, sewn-in vents, and marine-grade fabrics make the Essential Umbrella resistant to wind, corrosion, rust, and warping. Choose from hundreds of canopy and pole combinations to create the perfect umbrella to match your personal style.
